data.actual_result: THe text Box stays one line
data.expected_result: The Textbox should scretch around the third line
data.short_description: Regression: Textbox doesn't expand after switch away and back to app
data.steps_to_repro: - GO to a DM and Restart the App - Type enough Text (Can be anything) To trigger a second line of text - Observe and Eat Cake
